entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
